name: Mr.Gowrisankar S
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Mathematics(CA) )  - Kaamadhenu Arts and Science College   - 2006M.Sc  ( Mathematics )  - Bharathiar University   - 2008M.Phil  ( Mathematics )  - Bharathidasan University  - 07/10/2010(Ph.D)  ( Mathematics )  - PSG College of Technology
in_brief: Mr. Gowrisankar S is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences at PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore. He has more than 11 years teaching experience. He has qualified in SET Exam -2012 and GATE Exam -2012.
